name: Way of Boy
description: Way of Boy - a 2D computer game in the genre of action-adventure with elements of platformer and shooter, developed by Rapak Games. The game will take place in the so-called "Alternative Russia", in which the "boy" group, called the "Army AK44", declared war on the current "police" regime and won. As a result, they gained new power in their hometown. But the echoes of the "old regime" still make themselves felt. This was an “informal” guy who wanted to get into the AK44 Army and get rid of the past of his city.
